Production Co: 20th Century Fox, Ingenious Film Partners, Davis Entertainment
Synopsis: Garfield (Bill Murray) follows Jon (Breckin Meyer) to England and receives the royal treatment after he is mistaken for the heir to a grand castle. However, the feline will need all nine lives to foil the plans of evil Lord Dargis (Billy Connolly), who wants to turn the castle into a resort.
Title: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
